api_list.name: Airports Database API
api_list.description:
Airport data is fundamental to any aviation-related business.
Learn how to use the Airport Database API in your products.

body.name: Charles De Gaulle
body.alternatenames: Paris-Charles-de-Gaulle,Charles De Gaulle,Ch. De Gaulle,Ch. De Gaulle,Ch. De Gaulle,Шарль-де-Голль,สนามบินปารีสชาร์ลเดอโกล,Charles Degaulle,巴黎戴高乐机场

api_list.name: Airlines Database API
api_list.description: AirLabs Airline data is the most essential data for any travel startup and companies related to the aviation industry.

api_list.name: Cities Database API
api_list.description: City data complements and enhances airport data, if you need to create features that are independent of airports, you can use cities to replace them, and you can also combine them.

api_list.name: Live Flight Schedules API
api_list.description: The live schedules provide an information about the current status of the departure and arrival flights.

api_list.name: Flight Information API
api_list.description: Single flight detailed information by flight number with ICAO or IATA prefix.

api_list.name: Name Suggestion API

required_parameters.name: term
required_parameters.description:
**term** or **q** or **query** or **s** or **search** or **text**

Part of the destination name - airport, city or country.
Between 3 and 30 characters

api_list.name: NearBy Airports API
api_list.description: Use the NearBy API to show the nearest departure airport or all available airports in the desired radius.

api_list.name: Fleets Database API
Routes Database API
api_list.description:
Global Airline Routes Database API. 
Only 1 of the following query parameters is required.

api_list.name: Real-Time Flight Tracking API
api_list.description: Using the Flight API, you can track flights and show them on maps in your own products.

optional_parameters.name: bbox
optional_parameters.description: Bounding box of your map view
